dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: It's a pleasure being here. I've heard a lot about this place.

dialogues.speaker: Barbara
dialogues.text: Oh, I hope all good things. Our town may be small, but we've got a friendly community.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: That's always nice to hear. I look forward to getting to know everyone.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As Barbara and the player continued to converse, a gentle sense of camaraderie began to bloom. This was the start of a memorable adventure.
